sen.j: 大内 義綱（おおうち よしつな、生没年不詳）は戦国時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Yoshitsuna OUCHI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan).
Yoshitsuna OUCHI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan).
Yoshitsuna OUCHI (year of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan).
sen.cmt: 生没年不詳 year of birth and death unknown 用語統一リストより訂正しました。

sen.j: 陸奥国安達郡小浜城 (陸奥国)城主。
sen.e: He was a castellan of Obama-jo Castle, Adachi district, Mutsu Province.
He was a castellan of Obama-jo Castle, Adachi district, Mutsu Province.
He was a castellan of Obama-jo Castle, Adachi District, Mutsu Province.
His was also called Sadayori.
His was also called Sadayori.
He was also called Sadayori.

sen.j: 大内定綱、片平親綱の父。
sen.e: He was the father of Sadatsuna OUCHI and Chikatsuna KATAHIRA.
He was the father of Sadatsuna OUCHI and Chikatsuna KATAHIRA.
He was the father of Sadatsuna OUCHI and Chikatsuna KATAHIRA.

sen.j: 当初は塩松石橋氏の重臣であったが、天文 (日本)11年（1550年）に主君の石橋尚義を塩松城二の丸に幽閉して石橋氏の実権を掌握した。
sen.e: In 1550, when he was a senior vassal of the Shiomatsu Ishibashi clan, he took over the reins of his lord, Hisayoshi ISHIBASHI by confining him in Ninomaru (outer citadel) of Shiomatsu-jo Castle.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: In 1550, when he was a senior vassal of the Shiomatsu Ishibashi clan, he took over the reins of his lord, Hisayoshi ISHIBASHI by confining him in Ninomaru (outer citadel) of Shiomatsu-jo Castle.
In 1550, when he was a senior vassal of the Shiomatsu Ishibashi clan, he took over the reins of his lord, Hisayoshi ISHIBASHI by confining him in Ninomaru (outer citadel) of Shiomatsu-jo Castle.

sen.j: 永禄11年（1568年）には田村氏に内応して尚義を追放し、塩松地方を手中に収めた。
sen.e: In 1568, he secretly communicated with Tamura clan to banish Hisayoshi and got hold of Shionomatsu region.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: In 1568, he secretly communicated with Tamura clan to banish Hisayoshi and got hold of the Shionomatsu region.
In 1568, he secretly communicated with Tamura clan to banish Hisayoshi and got hold of the Shionomatsu region.

sen.j: 翌年には石橋氏の重臣だった宮森城主・大河内備中を攻め滅ぼしている。
sen.e: In the following year, he attacked and defeated Okochi Bitchu, the castellan of Miyamori-jo Castle. who was senior vassals of the Ishibashi clan.
In the following year, he attacked and defeated Okochi Bitchu, the castellan of Miyamori-jo Castle. who was senior vassal of the Ishibashi clan.
In the following year, he attacked and defeated Okochi Bitchu, the castellan of Miyamori-jo Castle who was senior vassal of the Ishibashi clan.
sen.cmt: 不要なピリオドを削除しました。

sen.j: その後は田村氏の旗下に入り、天正4年（1576年）に安積郡に侵攻し片平城を落とすなど活躍した。
sen.e: Since then he was under the banner of the Tamura clan and, in 1576, he played an active role in invading Asaka District and conquering Katahira-jo Castle.
Since that, he was under the banner of the Tamura clan and in 1576, he played an active role in invading Asaka District and conquering Katahira-jo Castle.
Since that, he was under the banner of the Tamura clan and in 1576, he played an active role in invading Asaka District and conquering Katahira-jo Castle.

sen.j: しかし子の定綱の代に独立して田村清顕とたびたび交戦した。
sen.e: However, Sadatsuna, his son that succeeded him, became dependent and often came into conflict with Kiyoaki TAMURA.
However, Sadatsuna, his son that succeeded him, became dependent and often came into conflict with Kiyoaki TAMURA.
However, Sadatsuna, his son that succeeded him, became dependent and often came into conflict with Kiyoaki TAMURA.
